description: The mission of the Dorothy I. Height Community Academy PCS is to create a caring learning community where students acquire the knowledge, skills, and habits of mind to think critically; to read, write, speak and listen effectively; to reason mathematically; to inquire scientifically; and to develop the social competence that ensures meeting qualifications for acceptance to a competitive high school.
